entry.title: Vim-pencil for Soft Line Breaks
entry.content: So I mentioned in a [previous post](/blog/2014/09/06/the-second-post/) that I wasn't happy with the way that word wrapping was working in VIM for me. I've found a VIM plugin that manages the whole thing a lot easier, called VIM-pencil, which adds word-wrapping in a decidedly more sensible way. Mainly it does both hard and soft wraps without messing up the formatting of a post. Thanks to YADR my environment is now looking very nice indeed.
